<@U2PDTMH53>  In *Content > Design Manager* you should be able to open up the template being used and then go to *Edit > Edit Head*. In there is an "Additional HTML Head Markup for this layout" section where you can add the following from this stack exchange thread (<http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11689353/disable-pinch-zoom-on-mobile-web>):
```
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" />
<meta name="HandheldFriendly" content="true" />
```
